title: Leaver Buster / Crashing
body:
I have had LeaverBuster for the past 10 matches now, and have recently been placed in it again. However, this is not because of myself intentionally leave games, but my computer crashing, and / or internet cutting out. Is there any way I can stop my computer / client from crashing so I can prevent LeaverBuster in the future? All my settings are on lowest and disabled / enabled appropriately to make my game run smoother. Furthermore, I have gone through and removed unneeded things on my computer taking up hard drive space, so there is really nothing more that I know of I can do. I am sick of having to wait for 20 mins each game before I can play (having waited 3 hours and 20 minutes to play in total over the span of the last 2 days), so any help would be much appreciated. 
~ Thanks, Defusionist.

replies.body:
[Let's troubleshoot your connectivity issues first.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) If your crashing persists, we'll move forward from there. 

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj

I used the hextech repair tool and it said everything is ok, however I still continue to crash. Also, a new problem has started to happen where I join a game and go into the loading screen (with all the champions, masteries, names, etc) then when all my friends join the game and buy there items, I have a pitch black screen with the LoL mouse there, and the only way to fix this is by shutting down my laptop. This has happened to me twice now and I don't know what the problem is.
Black screens in Champ Select are due to connectivity issues with your network and the servers. Refer to the article I linked above. Apologies for the wait.
